value:
The commander is pretty. How does
she get her hair so red? Maybe
with the blood of her enemies!

Lord Xander is my liege. He can be
a little scary, but I like him anyway.
He lets me fight lots and lots!

Good work patrolling. Hey, if you get
tired, come to me for some huggy,
squeezy, head-patty friend time!

I make a great stew. First, I go to a
good butcher. Then I look for fresh,
red meat—the drippier, the better!

I think about my mommy a lot. She's
gone, forever. But I'm a good cook
like she was, so she'll live forever!

Ooooh! I found you! I found
you! You've got to be
$Nu, right?$k$pSomeone friendly-wendly sent
me here to say hi. It was
$Nf!

Great! Can I go back to killing
guys now?

Let's see what color bad-guy
blood is!
Ugh! That's almost nothing!

You made me stronger, so I'll get
stabby with anyone you want!

I'm Peri. P as in pierce! E as in
eviscerate! R as in rupture!
And what's the I for...?$k$pInjure! I'm a cavalier from Nohr,
so just point me in a direction
and I'll get stabby!

Oh, I've been looking for you.
I have something tasty-wasty
that I made for you!$k$pCooked it myself. Oh, and I sliced
and diced the meat—and all
the veggies too!$k$pEat up while it's hot. Like it?
Scrumptious, right? YAY!$k$pMy mommy was great at cooking.
That's why I want to be good at it too.
That way, it's like she's with me!$k$pMore than anything, it means
that I know how to make you
happy-wappy!$k$pSo, count on Peri to spice
things up in the battle AND the
kitchen from now on!
それっ！
えーいなの！
ふええ…！
That hurts!
Right where I want you!
Bye-bye, intestines!
Time to play!
Killing is now!
Not me!
Kee hee!
I get stabby if people make me mad.
I can cook up food like you wouldn't believe!
The outfits in the Order of Heroes are so cute!
Why's your outfit so white? To make the blood spatters more spattery, right?
You work so hard! You deserve a huggy-wuggy!
Where's my Lord Xander! Where is he?! I need to protect him!
So, I'll get stabbity-stab with enemies, and you'll thank me. Deal?
OK!
Who's next?
It's time.
